Description: To verfiy that Gift Recharge is successful with only MSISDN and PIN.
To verify Gift Recharge is successful if channel user is barred as receiver.
To verify Gift Recharge is successful if user is insuspended
To verify Gift Recharge is not successful if user is outsuspended
To verify Gift Recharge is not successful if TCP is suspended
To verify Gift Recharge is not successful if channel user is suspended
To verify Gift Recharge is not successful if channel user barred as sender
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if MSISDN2 is missing
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if Amount is not present
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if Selector is missing
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if Amount present is negative
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if Gifter MSISDN is blank
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if Gifter  Name is blank
To verify Gift Recharge not successful if Gifter MSISDN Name and Language blank
